comments.raw_text:
On OS X we fake a global menubar in various windows using macBrowserOverlay.xul

This menubar tends to break every now and then in two ways:
1. New items which should be disabled are not (should be added to the list in nonBrowserWindowStartup)
2. The code under some methods, which could work in non-browser-windows (usually by opening a new window), change in a way that assumes it does run in a window.

An example for (1) is Bookmark All Tabs (now fixed). An example for (2) is Tools->Addons.  Yes, I forgot to file a bug.

We need a test that covers this area somehow. (1) is harder.
